features: Light it. This collapsible solar powered lantern is a lightweight companion to any adventure with 60 lumens of usable light on high, and a 35 hour runtime on low. It also features a soft candle flicker mode for ambiance
Color it. With six different color modes and a multi-color fade, you can turn any campsite into a party
Charge it. The Crush Light Chroma charges up with ease from any USB port via micro USB cable (included) and can be powered from the sun via its built-in solar panel
Crush it. The Crush light Chroma is as easy to store as it is to use, collapsing to just over half an inch
Note: Crush Light Chroma ships in Demo Mode. To take it out of Demo Mode, press and hold on/off button for 10 - 15 seconds.
